title: Novocaine
description: Seventeen year old Erin Michaels’ life is a seemingly normal one. She’s an avid reader, a writer, and she’s looking forward to graduating from high school. Then her mother receives a phone call from her brother Nikos, inviting the girls to move to Georgia. And that’s when things begin to change…A fall-out with the family sends Erin into a deep depression. She and her mother find themselves in a difficult situation, and must struggle to keep themselves afloat. Just when Erin thinks it’s over, she discovers the power of music, which leads her to a little band known as Our Lady of Righteous Rage…Novocaine is the in-between story, bridging the gap between Our Lady of Righteous Rage and the upcoming Your Fame Will Destroy You.
author: Nicole E. Woolaston
